info.name: Cerebellum, flocculonodular lobe
info.description: The flocculonodular lobe of the cerebellum is concerned with balance and equilibrium as well as movements of the eyes. It consists of the nodule portion of the vermis plus the flocculus of the hemisphere.
info.item: /Gross/Brain stem & Cerebellum/Brain stem/11 Brain stem - mid-sagittal view
